text: Mo' Better Blues is a 1990 comedy-drama movie that was directed by and starring Spike Lee. The movie also has Wesley Snipes, Denzel Washington and Samuel L. Jackson starring. The movie relates to pianos, nightclubs and jazz. Category:American musical movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:1990 musical movies Category:1990 comedy-drama movies Category:Movies directed by Spike Lee Category:English-language movies
title: Mo' Better Blues
